Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 106 Filed 12/30/20 Page 22 of 22
hearing to evaluate Maxwell's motion, and it declines to do so. See United States v. Raniere, No. 18-CR-2041 (NGG) (VMS), 2018 WL 6344202, at *2 n.7 (E.D.N.Y. Dec. 5, 2018).
IV. Conclusion
Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell's renewed motion for release on bail, Dkt. No. 97, is DENIED.
SO ORDERED.
Dated: December 28, 2020 New York, New York
ALISON J. NATHAN United States District Judge

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court order denying bail to Ghislaine Maxwell. The document is signed by Judge Alison J. Nathan. The document is in good condition with no visible redactions or damage.
